attributes.additional_details: Is our Immigration fit for purpose? Why are we still having issues after issues? Recent issue of Mr. Clarke and Madam May is shocking. Why do we have to be in situation where  rule is only for books and then short cut for people to implement and Minister defend after letting thousands of people in country. We are worst then third world country. It is time to go back in cabinet and have right Minister in position or give support T May  & team.
